title: Morning Mindfulness
description: Start your day with intention and awareness. This gentle meditation helps you ground yourself and set a positive tone for the day ahead.

title: 4-7-8 Stress Relief
description: A powerful breathing technique to quickly reduce anxiety and stress. Inhale for 4, hold for 7, exhale for 8.

title: Deep Relaxation
description: Release tension from your body and mind with this progressive relaxation meditation. Perfect for unwinding after a long day.

title: Box Breathing
description: Navy SEAL technique for maintaining calm under pressure. Inhale, hold, exhale, hold - each for 4 counts.

title: Gratitude Reflection
description: Explore what you're grateful for and how appreciation can shift your perspective on daily challenges.

title: Loving Kindness
description: Cultivate compassion for yourself and others through this heart-opening meditation practice.

title: Energizing Breath
description: Boost your energy and focus with this invigorating breathing exercise. Great for afternoon slumps.
